metadata.summary: Stream SentinelOne activities, threats, and alerts to LimaCharlie via API adapter
metadata.primary_use_case: Integrate SentinelOne endpoint security data into LimaCharlie for unified security monitoring

extracted_apis.path: ./lc_adapter sentinel_one client_options.identity.installation_key=<KEY> client_options.identity.oid=<OID> client_options.platform=sentinel_one client_options.hostname=<HOSTNAME> client_options.sensor_seed_key=<SEED> domain=<DOMAIN> api_key=<API_KEY>
